description.translate: Your legendary strength cannot	be broken by any of us.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Suprême Guédéron\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ta force légendaire ne saurait être \"}","{\"text\":\"§7brisée par aucun d'entre nous.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Your legendary strength cannot\"}","{\"text\":\"§7be broken by any of us.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7HUN§c-1\"}"]}}
